long_description: The Saris Freedom Recumbent Bar can be added on to the Saris Freedom Bike Rack to fit bikes with an axle-to-axle measurement of 57 in. Protective rubber holders adjust to fit almost any frame type. Arm folds flat when not in use. Ratcheting hold downs are easy to adjust. Fits 2 bikes, up to 35 lbs, each.
short_description: The Saris Freedom Recumbent Bar can be added on to the Saris Freedom Bike Rack to fit bikes with an axle-to-axle measurement of 57 in.
